list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain and is the basis of the fluids of living organisms.
a stretch or area of water, such as a river, sea, or lake.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lawns ran down to the water's edge
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bãi cỏ chạy xuống rìa của nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: drinking alcohol will make you need to pass water more often
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: uống rượu sẽ khiến bạn cần phải truyền nước thường xuyên hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the amniotic fluid surrounding a fetus in the womb, especially as discharged in a flow shortly before birth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I think my waters have broken
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nghĩ rằng nước của tôi đã bị hỏng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the quality of transparency and brilliance shown by a diamond or other gem.
capital stock that represents a book value greater than the true assets of a company.
pour or sprinkle water over (a plant or area) in order to encourage plant growth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I went out to water the geraniums
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi ra ngoài để tưới nước Geraniums

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the eyes) become full of moisture or tears.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rory chớp mắt, mắt anh tưới nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: dilute or adulterate (a drink, typically an alcoholic one) with water.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: staff at the club had been watering down the drinks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhân viên tại câu lạc bộ đã tưới nước xuống đồ uống

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: increase (a company's debt, or nominal capital) by the issue of new shares without a corresponding addition to assets.
